analyzed: śrī suvrahmaṇya dīkṣi vena viracitam nṛtya nāṭakam

original: pa mārajitaṃ bhaja manasā madhuragauṇaṃ sarvadā
analyzed: māra jitam bhaja manasā madhura gauṇam sarvadā
ca dāruṇa ābhava sāgara tāraṇam taruṇa aruṇa caraṇa yuga aanam
vṛkṣa mūla āsīnam śiṣya āvṛtam jñāna prasūnam
kiṃcid kāla anantaram vijayībhūtī indraḥ vijaya nṛttam nṛtyati

original: tataḥ sahasaiva śrabaṃrāt tripurāsurāḥ vividhāyudharvarṣaiḥ devān trāsayanti |
analyzed: tatas sahasā eva śrabaṃrāt tripura asurāḥ devān trāsayanti

original: bhayaṃkarātripurarūpaiḥ bādhitā vayaṃ bhītyā svayaṃbhuvaṃ śaṃbhunāthaṃ śivaṃ param śraghoraṃ
analyzed: bhayaṃkara a tripura rūpaiḥ bādhitāḥ vayam bhītyā svayaṃbhuvam śaṃbhu nātham śivam param

original: raktavantastīvrabhakatyā baddhāñlihastāḥ śrava bhava śiveti śrāhvaya prārthayāmaḥ
analyzed: raktavantaḥ tīvra bhakatyā baddhān li hastāḥ bhava śiva iti prārthayāmaḥ
tatas devāḥ śiva āgamanam vīkṣya gāyanti
nirāyudha kara yugaḥ samāvṛtta mara gaṇaḥ
ca sa ākrosam sarva śatru nāśam

original: ca 2 samaravijayasannaddhāḥ śraniruddhāḥ śratisamarthāḥ śrāśritāstrayaṃbake vayam
analyzed: ca samara vijaya sannaddhāḥ śra niruddhāḥ śrati samarthāḥ śra āśritāḥ trayaṃbake vayam
ca kara ghṛta āśu goham khaṇḍana catur oham
ca nirupama śakharṣaṇa utsukaḥ asmi aham
dānava bhīṣaṇa kara ghoṣa jyā maṇḍita pracaṇḍa ūham
vācām agocara vegeṇa vairi vaśayam kāraye

original: tataḥ sarve devāḥ parameśvara pārvatī ca pradakṣiṇaṃ kurvanti “ samaravijayasammaddhāḥ“
analyzed: tatas sarve devāḥ parameśvara pārvatī ca pradakṣiṇam kurvanti samara vijaya sammaddhāḥ
dṛṣṭā mamatā bhṛtam deva gaṇa śratvā pratāpa prakaṭīkaraṇam

original: matvā mabnasi tripuradahanaṃ mamattāharaṇa yugapada devanām

analyzed: smita ānanam himavat sutāya āh jita indriyaḥ śaṃbhu khalokya
duṃdubhi śata koṭi svanāt iva tripura

original: sarve devāḥ ḥ saṃgatāḥ parameśvarasya nṛttaṃ draṣṭum |
analyzed: sarve devāḥ saṃgatāḥ parameśvarasya nṛttam draṣṭum
pradoṣa samaye nṛtta param parameśvaram stuvanti amarāḥ

original: śra vrataṃ dhṛtaṃ natāvane vilaṃbite hate same
analyzed: vratam dhṛtam natā vane vilaṃbite hate same
ca tūṃburu vīṇā nandi mṛdaṃga vādanaiḥ utsāha pūrṇam
śaṃbhum avalokya sa smitam śraṃbuja ānanā haimavatī
biṃbāyita gīta amṛtā atra gīyatām tripurānta kathā
nārada muniḥ tadā tripurānta kathām gāyati

original: bhayaṃkaravarakrūrāmaranāśakaraparatripurāsurendraiḥ bādhito bhītabhīto purandharo viṣṇubraṃhādibhiḥ sakaladevagaṇeḥ saha tryaṃbakaṃ śaraṇaṃgato pālaya kṛpālaya parameśvareti yācate,
analyzed: bhayaṃkara vara krūra amara nāśa kara para tripura asura indraiḥ bādhitaḥ purandharaḥ viṣṇu braṃha ādibhiḥ sakala deva gaṇeḥ saha tryaṃbakam śaraṇaṃgato pālaya kṛpālaya parameśvara iti yācate
kṛpā taraṃgitta antaraṃgaḥ śaṃkara ubhayaṃkaraḥ tadā eva tripurāntaka paraḥ bhavati
tam prārthayanti devāḥ śāstrīyatām asmān iti

original: voḍī devaiko dhanurbhavāmīti śranyo bhavāmi sāyakamiti
analyzed: voḍī deva ekaḥ dhanuḥ bhavāmi iti śranyaḥ bhavāmi sāyakam iti
karuṇā rasa aṃkita hāsya rasa utpattyā coditaḥ
bhūta tripura dahanam vīkṣya vismayāt pulla locanāḥ
sṛṣṭam nava śāstram idam abhinaya nāma aṃkitam iti

original: pa śrṛṇu me mahāmuni sṛṣṭaṃ navaṃ śāstramidam
analyzed: śrṛṇu me mahā muni sṛṣṭam navam śāstram idam
locana dvayam iva edam pālaya nava rasa aṃkitam
ca gaṇītam pauruṣa aṃkitam tāṇḍavam bhavet
dharaṇyām tad taṇḍunā śikṣā aham bhavet
strī bhāva nṛtyam lāsya nāma aṃkitam
śaṃbhu na ayam dūri kṛta khila durita samūham
nṛttaiḥ abhinayaiḥ sa ānanda lāsya tāṇḍavābhyām
śūla āyugha dhaṭa śaṃbhu parvatabālām ca
kiṇkirṇā mālābhiḥ ārāḥ dhayāmaḥ u vayam
śrasura nāśane vīra raudra ādi bhāvān darśayanta
bhava āliṃgita madhyamāvatīm bhavaṃca api vaṃdāmahe
ca gaṃgādharam śaṃkā bhṛtauḥ vācakaiḥ nindantīm
tuṃga svana bhara cadana sikām dvāre vāsaka sajjikām
